channel.title: Warrior guild help! PLEASE IM STUCK!
channel.description: i made a warrior guild. but i wanna if i could make it so u need atk and str to enter. like runescape for example. u need ur atk and str to add up to 140 to get in. if any1 knows how to do this please post! i cant figure it out!

@lacose wrote:

Just make a new folder in your server directioray and name it backups then before you edit anything copy the thing your editing and paste it in the backup folder that way if you get errors you can just paste the backupd one.

item.source: Warrior guild help! PLEASE IM STUCK!

item.title: Warrior guild help! PLEASE IM STUCK!
item.dc:creator: @lacose lacose
item.description:
@lacose wrote:

Ok seems you need LOTS of help you have like 3 posts.
MAKE SURE TO BACKUP FILES!
SO heres how you do it.
Search for case 4449
Then under the break;
hit enter and paste this

case ####: // if (playerLevel[0] >= 70) { teleportToX = @@@@; teleportToY = @@@@; sendMessage("You teleport to the Strength Guild!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 70 Attack in order to enter this portal."); } break;
Ok now for the #### put whatever the id of the object is that you want to click for it to teleport you there.
And for the @@@@ put the x and y cords so it would look like this. DONT ACTUALLY USE THIS ONE.

case 7312: // memberportal if (playerLevel[0] >= 70) { teleportToX = 3472; teleportToY = 3870; sendMessage("You teleport to the Strength Guild!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 70 Attack in order to enter this portal."); } break;

And where it says if (playerlevel[0] >= 70) {
Thats telling the server you need either 70 or higher attack becasuse of the playerlevel[0] That represents attack.

Hope it helped somewhat

Read full topic
